##========================================================================
## NAME
=pod

=head1 NAME

DiaColloDB::Client::file - diachronic collocation db: client: local dbdir

=cut

##========================================================================
## DESCRIPTION
=pod

=head1 DESCRIPTION

DiaColloDB::Client::file is a subclass of
L<DiaColloDB::Client|DiaColloDB::Client> for
accessing a local L<DiaColloDB|DiaColloDB> database ("dbdir")
via a C<file://> URL.
It supports the L<DiaColloDB::Client|DiaColloDB::Client> API
by calling the underlying L<DiaColloDB|DiaColloDB> methods
on its C<db> object key.

new() options and object structure:

 ##-- DiaColloDB::Client: options
 url  => $url,       ##-- local url; query form is used as db parameters ##-- CONTINUE HERE: adjust dstar web params to auto-set ddcServer!
 ##
 ##-- DiaColloDB::Client::file
 db   => $db,        ##-- underlying DiaColloDB object

Options to the underlying L<DiaColloDB|DiaColloDB> object can be passed
as URL-encoded parameters in query part of the argument URL.

=cut
